product.title: Affinity Pure - Vertical Blind
product.description: The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. This blind blends class with functionality, as its cutting edge filter fabric and no-fuss louvres make this a usable and durable window covering. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. This blind would also make a pretty addition to a guest or master bedroom, where tranquillity and calm rule the roost.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Affinity Plaster - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity blind in plaster offers a fresh take on cream, infused with just a hint of buttery yellow to give this blind a richer tone without being overpowering or overtly gold. The affinity patterning adds that touch of chic class that you have been looking for. The subtle glowing quality of the affinity plaster make this blind an ideal addition to a decadent yet tasteful bedroom or living room, where it couples well with traditional wooden features.

relproducts.title: Affinity Storm - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The lightweight, easy-to-use affinity storm is comprised of a dark grey backdrop fabric covered with a high quality, stitched pattern that reduces the light coming in from outdoors without having the full influence of a blackout blind. The way that the pattern is stitched allows the affinity storm to gently shine, giving it a modern and chic quality. Try contrasting with dark blues or purples in the living room to provide a rich, opulent colour scheme, or use the affinity patterning to provide character in a much more colour-neutral hallway or landing.

relproducts.title: Affinity Silver - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity in silver combines the distinctive affinity patterning with a barely-there silver fabric to provide a truly stunning interaction between room light and blind, making an ethereal addition to any home. This pretty fabric keeps out enough of the outside world to offer privacy, yet won't totally blackout a room. Couple the affinity silver with a dark navy for a moody yet beautiful bedroom colour scheme, or add a hint of sophistication to a monochrome dining room.

relproducts.title: Affinity Pure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity pure takes a lightweight, easy-hanging white fabric with a subtle hint of cream, and uses it to host a pure white, modern pattern. The contrast between the stitching and fabric adds interest to an otherwise neutral blind. Use the affinity pure as part of a fresh, neutral colour scheme in a living room or home office. Or make a real feature of it, by setting it amongst brightly painted walls to make it really stand out in a colourful bedroom or playroom.

relproducts.title: Affinity Touch - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: If you're looking for an off-white, patterned blind that oozes class and sophistication, then the affinity touch could be the one you've been looking for. The beautifully lightweight fabric displays the carefully stitiched, signature affinity pattern to give the touch an elegant, tasteful feel. The affinity touch will complement bolder colours well, particularly deep browns, rich purples, and shimmering golds, making it the ideal addition to living rooms and dining rooms, whether contemporary or traditional.

relproducts.title: Affinity Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity blind in black is a lightly patterned fabric that offers great protection from the outside light, whilst still providing style and elegance. The easy-to-use roller-blind is durable, lightweight, and high quality; everything one looks for in a home blind. The delicate patterning of the affinity black looks can add interest to monochrome dcor schemes, where blacks, greys, and whites win the day.

relproducts.title: Affinity Touch - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity touch is close to pure white, but without the stark brightness, and has a pretty scattered patterning over the top. This simple and attractive blind is made from an enduring, textured fabric, and offers effective light-filtering properties to allow the light in whilst offering privacy. Use in the bedroom for a romantic, wistful feel, without compromising on contemporary design. Surround with dusky pinks or muted greens for country, summery look all year round, and accessorise with brushed golds and cast iron furniture.

relproducts.title: Affinity Silver - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Affinity's silver combines a shimmering fabric background with raised, pretty patterning to craft a pretty yet unobtrusive filter blind. A robust vertical blind, the neatly hanging louvres will work effortlessly open and close on demand. The silver can sit as a soft window feature against white walls and light woods to create a modern take on traditional styling in a living room or bedroom. Or use it with dark greys and silver accessories for a cool, one-of-a-kind look in your bathroom or hallway.

relproducts.title: Affinity Storm - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The muted grey of the affinity storm is offset by the raised stitched pattern that covers the blind from head to toe. This pretty blind does little to give away the resilience of its high quality fabric, yet it is nonetheless durable and long-lasting. The storm would suit a fresh, contemporary dining room, in combination with white walls and glass furniture, and would work brilliantly as an attractive window feature in an otherwise plain downstairs cloakroom, hallway, or utility room.

relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the amor soft peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms. relproducts.title: Affinity Plaster - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Affinity's plaster is warm and welcoming, and creates a homely, classic feel in any room, whilst maintaining a feeling of contemporary, modern-day style. Its louvre's tilting mechanism is simple and easy to use, so that can let light in or keep it out as you see fit. The plaster will sit pretty amidst dark browns and medium woods, whether in the living room, bedroom, hallway, or anywhere else you would like a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

relproducts.title: Affinity Black - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The blackest of blacks, the affinity black is a bold and contemporary choice of blind, yet with a traditional scattered pattern sitting gently on top. This is a blind that exists only to stand up and be noticed, and there is certainly no missing it. Design a monochrome home office space by making the black its central feature, and surrounding it with stark whites and cool greys. Add a splash of colour if you like, using bright citrus shades, a bold red, or creamy pastels.
